(45) 346.20th December, 1945.CABINET.COMMITTEE ON FASCISM.Memorandum by the Secretary of the Cabinet.IN accordance with the decision of the Cabinet on the 17th November, 1945,*the Prime Minister has appointed a Committee with the following terms ofreference: - ." To review the available evidence as to the re-emergence of a Fascistmovement in this country, and to consider the case for amending the existing law with a view to checking the growth of such a movement."The Committee is composed as follows : Lord Chancellor (Chairman) *Home Secretary.First Lord of the Admiralty.Minister of Labour and National Service.Minister of Fuel and Power.The Secretaries of the Committee are : -Mr. J. A. Drew, Cabinet Office.Miss J. J. Nunn, Home Office.Cabinet Office, S.W, 1,20th December, 1945.(Signed) E. E. BRIDGES.* CM. (45) 63rd Conclusions, Minute 3.[31068]
